description: Registry of all completed analyses with their sources and key findings

ground_truth_data.description: Authoritative data sources from Anna's spreadsheet - use these for supply metrics

anna_family_dishes.description: 142 curated family dishes with brand, cuisine, and dish type

anna_zone_dish_counts.source: Dish Analysis Dec-25 - Zone X Dish Mapping.csv
anna_zone_dish_counts.description: 1306 zones with dish counts, cuisine breakdown, and brand counts

ground_truth_data.note: Always use Anna's data for supply metrics (what we have). Use Snowflake order data for behavioral metrics (how it performs).

dish_scoring.description: Top 100 priority dishes with Track A (performance) and Track B (opportunity) scores
dish_scoring.methodology: Two-track scoring combining order volume, satisfaction, and latent demand
key_findings: Top cuisines: Asian (67 dishes), Italian (31), Indian (19), Healthy (17), Mexican (14)
Top dish types: Rice Bowl, Pasta, Grain Bowl, Noodles, Curry

dish_indices.description: Demand and preference indices for 2x2 matrix visualization

categories.Expand: High demand + High preference - protect and expand
categories.Recruit: High demand + Low preference - recruit partners for these
categories.Fix: Low demand + High preference - fix availability issues
categories.Monitor: Low demand + Low preference - monitor or deprioritize

zone_analysis.description: MVP status for each zone based on partner and cuisine thresholds
key_findings: 434 zones have at least one family dish available
Top zones by dish variety: Islington (83), East Central (80), West Central (75)

cuisine_gap_analysis.description: Gaps in cuisine coverage by zone
key_findings: Core cuisines: Asian, Italian, Indian, Healthy, Mexican, Middle Eastern, British
Most common gaps: Middle Eastern, British, Healthy in suburban zones

partner_cuisine_matrix.description: Matrix showing which partners offer which cuisines

behavioral_data.description: Order and rating data from Snowflake - use for performance metrics

og_survey.bias_warning: Reflects opinions of surveyed users, not all customers

post_order_survey.file: DATA/1_SOURCE/anna_slides/Dish Analysis Dec-25 - Post Order Survey Data.csv
